Stretch-n-Grow Programs

How to Enroll Your Child into a Program?

Support 9-5 MST Monday-Friday

JOIN US
There are over 9 classes for your kids!

SNG of the Rockies offers summer enrichment programs. Visit our homepage to book your schools summer enrichment programs.


Yoga Stars

Yoga Stars is a program that teaches young children the basics of Yoga. We incorporate stories, music, and play to help children find inner peace in a safe and calm environment.

Register
More info
Fitness Stars

This weekly early childhood physical education, nutrition and wellness program improves the level of fitness in our Stars and teaches them the importance of a healthy lifestyle and the perils of inactivity.

Register
More info
Gymnastics

We bring the gym to your school! All-Star Gymnastics incorporates independent movement and basic social skills while continuing to develop confidence in gross motor skills and beginning tumbling moves and skills.

Register
More info
Sports

Our All Star Sports skills program focuses on the skills and technique forBaseball, Basketball, Soccer, Football, Field Hockey, and Track & Field - complete with scrimmages for each sport!

Register
More info
Music Stars

Music Stars is an exploration and development program filled with songs integrated with physical movement, dramatic play, and exploration of instruments. We incorporate tambourines, triangles, maracas, drums, and more!

Register
More info
Camp Fit

Our action-packed Fitness Boot Camp is sure to get the troops in shape! Each session - led by CERTIFIED fitness instructors - involves continuous, vigorous activity that incorporates endurance, strength, flexibility and motor skill development - and FUN!

Register
More info
Kids Dance Party

The DANCE FLOOR comes to Your DOOR with Kid's Dance Party! Your kids will have a BLAST as they learn to move-n-groove and rock-n-roll! With Kid's Dance Party in the house, there's no sitting down!

Register
More info
Dancing Stars

Dancing Stars is a Ballet & Creative Dance Program. Ballet is the foundation for all genres of dance. Our curriculum is designed to teach our children a life-long love of dance and movement.

Register
More info
Staff Yoga Classes

Stretch-n-Grow would love to serve your workplace community. We offer: weekly staff classes, 1-day - staff appreciation, and team building. We also offer onsite in-service kids yoga teacher training for schools/educators.

Fitness Stars 5 Points Of Success

  • Fun, age Age-appropriate exercises
  • Future sports and school readiness
  • FUNtastic theme curriculum kids love
  • Focus on emotional intelligence
  • Formal communications with email and social media

Teach children how they should live, and they will remember it all their life. – Proverbs 22:6

About Stretch-n-Grow

Stretch -n- Grow is the world’s largest network of certified youth fitness instructors providing fun & engaging enrichment programs that get kids moving at their schools.

We specialize in high quality, FUN exercise experiences that get kids moving, including: Fitness, Dance, Gymnastics, Sports, Music and Yoga.

​ What started as a dream to get kids more active and physically fit expanded into building Stretch- N-Grow. Kendra Urban has been a Stretch-n-Grow owner since 2006, having served hundreds of thousands of families over the years.

We serve Southlake, Colleyville, North Richland Hills, Keller, Downtown, Central & NW Fort Worth, Weatherford, Southern DFW, & Ellis County.
